title: Did Trump say that policemen should "empty people " during arrests?
subtitle: The comments made by the President in 2017 reappeared in May 2020 following the murder of George Floyd, a black man who died after a police officer in Minneapolis kneeled on his neck.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: In July 2017, United States President Donald Trump said that police officers should "group more people" and not worry about hurting suspects during arrests,
